definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: lift, take, carry (cf. BH; rare in Aram.; v. [[נְסִי]], [[נְסָא]] ChWB, NHWB);—

definitions.title: Pe.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[נ]]: Da 2:35 carry away (of wind, c. acc. rei); Imv. ms. [[שֵׂא]] Ezr 5:15 take (acc. vessels).

definitions.title: Hithpa.
definitions.body: make a rising, an insurrection: Pt. fs. [[מִתְנַשְּׂאָה]] Ezr 4:19, [[עַל]] pers.
